sentence.Network_en: Specialist subjects are full of pitfalls for the unwary.
sentence.Network_cn: 专业学科充满陷阱，专套粗心大意的人。

sentence.Network_en: Tax can be a minefield for the unwary.
sentence.Network_cn: 粗心大意的人在纳税方面很容易出错。

sentence.Network_en: The stock market is full of traps for the unwary.
sentence.Network_cn: 对无风险意识的人而言，股票市场充满了陷阱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unwarranted 无根据的 unwary 不注意的 unwashed 下层民众.
自考英语阅读（二）词汇表(Unit 16-18) ... tutelage n. 守护，保护 unwary a. 粗心大意的；不警惕的 vermilion n. 朱红色.
刘毅词汇22000(带音标版) ... unquenchable 难抑制的 unwary 不小心的 underbrush 矮树丛.
英语作文范文辞典 - 用好资源 ... pounce 猛扑，突然袭击 unwary 不注意的，不警惕的 plumage 长有…羽毛.

list.abs: a stratagem for catching or tricking an unwary person ., 圈套迷住或欺骗一个不警觉的人的计谋.
to deceive ( an unwary person ) .欺骗(易上当的人)
...在断定诱惑侦查辩护事由成立与否时，必须在坠入“圈套”轻率的无辜者（unwary innocent ）与轻率的犯罪者(unwary criminal)之间划一界线。5这在判定诱惑侦查之辩护事由成立标准方面又前进了一步，更加明确化。但本案中，有法官不同.
a stratagem for catching or tricking an unwary person ., 圈套迷住或欺骗一个不警觉的人的计谋.
He who confides in her - his unwary heart !, 他谁在她的倾诉 - 他粗心的心!

entry.tran: 无戒备的；无防备的；无警惕的
entry.def: If you describe someone as unwary, you mean that they are not cautious or experienced and are therefore likely to be harmed or deceived.

example.ex: With its quicksands the river usually drowns a few unwary visitors every season.
example.tran: 因有流沙，往往每季都会有几个游客不小心在这条河里溺水身亡。

means.word_mean: 1. not alert to danger or deception;

sentences.sentence: "the shrieks of unwary animals taken by surprise"
"some thieves prey especially on unwary travelers"
"seduce the unwary reader into easy acquiescence"- O.J.Campbell
